book-dash.description: Book Dash gathers creative volunteers to create new African storybooks that anyone can freely print, translate and distribute.
book-dash.name: Book Dash

bookbot.description: Bookbot has a mission to address the worldwide issue of shockingly low literacy levels.
bookbot.name: Bookbot

icharacter.description: iCharacter creates books, music and videos for children that focus on character building topics.
icharacter.name: iCharacter

paul-choy.description: The "Adventures of Little Mouse" books are a charming series of books for children, each featuring stories from the world of Little Mouse and his woodland friends.
paul-choy.name: Paul Choy

pratham-books.description: Pratham Books is a nonprofit publisher introducing children to the joy of reading.
pratham-books.name: Pratham Books

room-to-read.description: Room to Read is a non-profit organization for improving literacy and gender equality in education in the developing world.
room-to-read.name: Room to Read

storybooks-canada.description: Storybooks Canada is a free open educational resource that promotes literacy and language learning in homes, schools, and communities.
storybooks-canada.name: Storybooks Canada

storyweaver.description: Designed to provide children with reading resources, StoryWeaver is a digital gateway to thousands of richly illustrated, open-licensed children's stories.
storyweaver.name: StoryWeaver
